name: IC Sovereign Persistent Memory
description: Sovereign, persistent AI memory on the Internet Computer. Your memories live in a personal canister that only you control.

canisterId.description: Your personal vault canister ID (set automatically during setup)

factoryCanisterId.description: Factory canister ID for vault creation

autoSync.description: Auto-sync memories to your IC vault

syncOnSessionEnd.description: Sync session data when a session ends

syncOnAgentEnd.description: Sync new memories when a conversation ends

canisterId.label: Vault Canister ID
canisterId.help: Your personal vault canister ID on the Internet Computer. Set automatically when you run the setup command.

factoryCanisterId.label: Factory Canister ID
factoryCanisterId.help: Factory canister that creates user vaults. Pre-configured for IC mainnet.

network.label: Network
network.help: Use 'ic' for Internet Computer mainnet (default), 'local' for development with dfx.

autoSync.label: Auto Sync
autoSync.help: Automatically sync memories and sessions to your IC vault in the background.

syncOnSessionEnd.label: Sync on Session End
syncOnSessionEnd.help: Push session data to your IC vault when a session ends.

syncOnAgentEnd.label: Sync on Agent End
syncOnAgentEnd.help: Push new memories to your IC vault when a conversation ends.
